ygData.msgSnippet: This is the latest one. Teien Truescale EsterTheTester Station Member   posted 08-29-2000 08:37 PM ... Well as you can tell we ve closed Test for a few days.
ygData.messageBody:
This is the latest one.
Teien Truescale



EsterTheTester
Station Member posted 08-29-2000 08:37 PM
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
Well as you can tell we've closed Test for a few days. What this means is
that me and my testers are working very hard and no one has time to devote
to the boards.
No I'm not going to talk about it :P but once we're done I promise to get
back to business as usual.

Thanks for your patience!!!

oh this is the only time we ever forsee shutting down test server. I can
almost guarentee that it won't happen again for these reasons. I can't be
held accountable for hardware!!!
